alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 4:51AM MST until December 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow Above 3500 feet. Snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph on Whitebird Grade. * WHERE...Whitebird Hill and higher elevations. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. High winds on Whitebird Grade combined with slick conditions could be hazardous for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
